title: Nottingham PATT-Linked Travel Grant
abstractText: This grant is to support travel to telescopes abroad, to enable our group to conduct research into astronomy and astrophysics.
impactText: This is a small grant to support travel to use STFC-funded telescopes abroad. All the relevant outputs are reported elsewhere, in the Nottingham Astronomy Rolling Grants and Consolidated Grants (ST/I001212/1 and ST/L000695/1).
findingsText: This is a small grant to support travel to use STFC-funded telescopes abroad. All the relevant outputs are reported elsewhere, in the Nottingham Astronomy Rolling Grants and Consolidated Grants (ST/I001212/1 and ST/L000695/1).
